text: Baliram Bhagwan Sirskar is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Balapur Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Nationalist Congress Party. Before He Was In Vanchit Bahujan Aghadi ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Bharipa Bahujan Mahasangh politicians Category:Living people Category:People from Akola district Category:Marathi politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Vanchit Bahujan Aghadi politicians
title: Baliram Sirskar
